cachedTotalUnderlying().details: this is useful in cases where we want to reduce gas usage and do not need a precise value
cachedTotalUnderlying().notice: same as `totalUnderlying` but returns a cached version that might be slightly outdated if oracle prices have changed

params.minLpReceived: The minimum amoun of LP to accept from the deposit

returns._0: lpReceived The amount of LP received

params.minLpReceived: The minimum amoun of LP to accept from the deposit
params.stake: Whether or not to stake in the LpTokenStaker

returns._0: lpReceived The amount of LP received

depositFor(address,uint256,uint256,bool).notice: Deposit underlying on behalf of someone

params.minLpReceived: The minimum amount of LP to accept from the deposit

returns._0: lpReceived The amount of LP received

exchangeRate().notice: Get current exchange rate for the pool's LP token to the underlying

handleDepeggedCurvePool(address).details: Cannot be called if the underlying of this pool itself has depegged.
handleDepeggedCurvePool(address).notice: Called when an underlying of a Curve Pool has depegged and we want to exit the pool. Will check if a coin has depegged, and will revert if not. Sets the weight of the Curve Pool to 0, and re-enables CNC rewards for deposits.

handleInvalidConvexPid(address).notice: Allows anyone to set the weight of a Curve pool to 0 if the Convex pool for the associated PID has been shutdown. This is a very unilkely outcomu and the method does not reenable rebalancing rewards.

params.curvePool_: Curve pool for which the Convex PID is invalid (has been shut down)

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

totalUnderlying().notice: Get current underlying balance of pool

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

unstakeAndWithdraw(uint256,uint256).notice: Unstake LP Tokens and withdraw underlying

params.conicLpAmount: Amount of LP tokens to burn
params.minUnderlyingReceived: Minimum amount of underlying to redeem This should always be set to a reasonable value (e.g. 2%), otherwise the user withdrawing could be forced into paying a withdrawal penalty fee by another user

usdExchangeRate().details: This is using the cached total underlying value, so is not precisely accurate.
usdExchangeRate().notice: Get current exchange rate for the pool's LP token to USD

params.conicLpAmount: Amount of LP tokens to burn
params.minUnderlyingReceived: Minimum amount of underlying to redeem This should always be set to a reasonable value (e.g. 2%), otherwise the user withdrawing could be forced into paying a withdrawal penalty fee by another user

maxDeviation.details: once the deviation gets under this threshold, the reward distribution will be paused until the next rebalancing. This is expressed as a ratio, scaled with 18 decimals

rebalancingRewardActive.details: `true` while the reward distribution is active

totalDeviationAfterWeightUpdate.details: the absolute value in terms of USD of the total deviation after the weights have been updated
